code: import invariant from'fbjs/lib/invariant';class Share{static share(content,options){if(options===void 0){options={};}invariant(typeof content==='object'&&content!==null,'Content to share must be a valid object');invariant(typeof content.url==='string'||typeof content.message==='string','At least one of URL and message is required');invariant(typeof options==='object'&&options!==null,'Options must be a valid object');invariant(!content.title||typeof content.title==='string','Invalid title: title should be a string.');if(window.navigator.share!==undefined){return window.navigator.share({title:content.title,text:content.message,url:content.url});}else{return Promise.reject(new Error('Share is not supported in this browser'));}}static get sharedAction(){return'sharedAction';}static get dismissedAction(){return'dismissedAction';}}export default Share;
